item.title: Cooking With Fire
item.description: Just another yet random blog to practicing Kerberoasting on Linux and Windows, focusing on practical steps with tools like Rubeus and GetUserSPNs.py.

item.title: API Testing || Attacking REST, Swagger APIs {Portswigger}
item.description: Started researching on attacking APIs few days ago, which has been fun....In the below walkthrough i have solved all API testing labs on portswigger.

item.title: Bait, Hook, and Hack
item.description: Few tactics and techniques behind phishing attacks i have came accrossed in simulated labs xD

item.title: From Proof.txt to Paychecks ‚Äî Day One
Am I a hecker yet ü§î? CVE-2024-44871 and CVE-2024-44872!
Time Races Ahead Before You Blink
How threat actors take advantage of companies on holiday
item.description: Overview During holiday periods, alot of companies scale down operations, whereas employees take time off work and most of all security teams operate with minimal staff. Threat Actors/Advanced Persistent Threats (APTs) use this as an avenue to launch cyberattacks as there are reduction in vigilance making this a prime window to carry out attacks like ransomeware, DDOS, Phishing and many other sophisticated cyber attacks. Here are few common tactics used by adversaries during holidays and recommendations to mitigate the risks.

item.title: Bypass Azure Web App Authentication with Path Traversal
item.description: Learn how attackers exploit path traversal vulnerabilities to bypass authentication and gain unauthorized access to Azure Web Apps.

item.title: Azure Recon to Foothold and Profit
item.description: Discover how various reconnaisance techniques could be used to enumerate Azure subscriptions and Tenant to identify mistakes or weak points when setting up an environment

item.title: Unmask Privileged Access In Azure
item.description: After leveraging a password found in an image and gaining access to Azure as Matteus Lundgren, we escalated privileges by adding ourselves to the DEVICE-ADMINS group, granting us access to critical resources, including an SSH key for the VM AUTOMAT01.

item.title: Embracing the Chaos; My Journey Through Uncertainty
item.description: Arhhh, You don't have to understand......

item.title: Loot Exchange, Teams and SharePoint with GraphRunner
item.description: In this lab, We look ino the use of a tool, Graphrunner, a post-exploitation toolset for interacting with the Microsoft Graph API......:D

item.title: Unlock Access with Azure Key Vault
item.description: Explore how Azure Key Vault securely stores and manages secrets, keys, and certificates, and how misconfigurations can lead to the retrieval of sensitive information

item.title: Intro to Azure Recon with BloodHound
item.description: BloodHound together with an ingestor Azurehound can map Azure AD relationships, revealing roles, permissions, and attack paths, helping identify misconfigurations and privilege escalation opportunities in cloud environments.

item.title: Azure Blob Container to Initial Access
item.description: Discover how Azure Blob Containers can be exploited for initial access in cloud environments and learn best practices to secure them
